content: 2023 Caribbean Treasures Fully Funded 10,000 Satoshi Brass Rounds This is one of the smallest denominations made by CT and is intended for small trade/transactions. Each is fully funded and sold in bundles of 10. Price is 0.009 BTC This price includes funding and shipping within the USA. You will receive a bag of ten (10) brass fully funded with 10,000 Sats each. Each bundle will be hand stamped with the location of the purchase. Overseas buyers will need to add more Sats for shipping. I also have ppff, cashapp and venmo if needed. Material: BrassSize: 0.982"Denomination: 10,000 SATS Year: 2023Mintage: TBD

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: If someone wants to split a bag - I would like 2 coins only

comments.author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on April 27, 2023, 11:07:38 PMIf someone wants to split a bag - I would like 2 coins onlyI've been selling singles for $35ea. or 0.0012 BTC currently. If I sell in bundles of 10 I can save people sats  Let me know if you want them for 0.0012 EA and ill send you a funding address. 0.0012 gets them funded and shipped to you. They are sweet pieces for the price.

comments.body: I bought a bunch, arrived quick and they look great. Good work CT!
